through messaging platforms like WhatsApp. This guide will walk you through getting OpenClaw up and running on your system."}],["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Prerequisites"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300","children":"Before you begin, ensure you have the following:"}],["$","ul",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 space-y-2","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"className":"text-white","children":"Node.js:"}]," Version 18.x or higher."]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"className":"text-white","children":"NPM or Yarn:"}]," Package manager for Node.js."]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"className":"text-white","children":"WhatsApp Account:"}]," A personal WhatsApp number to link."]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"className":"text-white","children":"OpenClaw Account (Optional):"}]," For cloud-hosted deployments, though this guide focuses on local setup."]}]]}],["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Step 1: Installation"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300","children":"OpenClaw is typically installed via npm. Open your terminal and run the following command:"}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"npm install -g openclaw"}]}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mt-4","children":"This global installation ensures the `openclaw` command is available in your environment."}],["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Step 2: Initial Configuration"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300","children":"After installation, you'll need to configure OpenClaw's connection to WhatsApp. This is usually done via a pairing process."}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"openclaw whatsapp login start"}]}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mt-4","children":"This command will generate a QR code. Open your WhatsApp application, go to \"Linked Devices,\" and scan the QR code."}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mt-2","children":"Follow the on-screen prompts in your terminal to approve the connection."}],["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Step 3: Running Your First Agent"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300","children":"Once configured, you can start OpenClaw. For basic interactive use, you might run:"}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"openclaw gateway start"}]}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mt-4","children":"This starts the OpenClaw gateway, allowing it to listen for commands and process messages."}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mt-2","children":"You can then interact with OpenClaw through your linked WhatsApp number. Try sending a simple command like \"Hello\" or \"What's the current time?\"."}],["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Next Steps"}],["$","ul",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 space-y-2","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Explore OpenClaw commands and capabilities."}],["$","li",null,{"children":["Read about ",["$","$L2",null,{"href":"/guides/securing-ai-agent","className":"text-blue-400 hover:underline","children":"securing your AI agent"}],"."]}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Configure specialized skills to extend OpenClaw's functionality."}]]}]]}]]}],["$","footer",null,{"className":"bg-gray-900 border-t border-gray-800 mt-12","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 py-8","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-center text-gray-500 text-sm","children":"Â© 2026 AI Daily News.
